item.title: Meet India’s ChatGPT Rival – Hanooman GPT is Here!
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction It’s not Tuesday, but it’s still a Hanooman’s day. Finally, the SML-powered Hanooman GPT is here! India now has its own indigenous alternative to OpenAI’s viral ChatGPT model. Hanooman GPT is a series of open-source Indic large language models developed by the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay in partnership with healthcare AI firm […]
